# Community Guidelines

Welcome to the CuePoint community! We're glad you're here.

## How to Participate

### Ask Questions
- Use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/stuchain/CuePoint/discussions) for questions
- Search existing discussions before asking
- Be clear and specific in your questions
- Provide context and details

### Share Ideas
- Use Discussions for feature ideas and suggestions
- Explain the problem and proposed solution
- Be open to feedback and discussion
- Consider alternatives

### Help Others
- Answer questions when you can
- Share your knowledge and experience
- Be patient with newcomers
- Provide constructive feedback

### Report Issues
- Use [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/stuchain/CuePoint/issues) for bugs
- Use issue templates for better organization
- Provide detailed information
- Include steps to reproduce

## Discussion Categories

### Q&A
Ask questions and get help from the community.

### Ideas
Share feature ideas and suggestions for improvement.

### Show and Tell
Showcase your work, share tips, and celebrate successes.

### Announcements
Project announcements, releases, and important updates.

## Best Practices

### Before Posting
1. Search for existing discussions or issues
2. Check documentation and FAQ
3. Gather relevant information
4. Be clear and concise

### When Responding
1. Be helpful and constructive
2. Provide examples when possible
3. Link to relevant resources
4. Be respectful and patient

### Code Contributions
1. Read [Contributing Guide](CONTRIBUTING.md)
2. Follow coding standards
3. Write tests for new features
4. Document your changes

## Moderation

We maintain a respectful and inclusive community. Moderators may:
- Remove inappropriate content
- Warn or ban users who violate guidelines
- Close discussions that don't follow guidelines
- Take other actions as needed

## Getting Help

- **Questions**: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/stuchain/CuePoint/discussions)
- **Bugs**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/stuchain/CuePoint/issues)
- **Documentation**: [Documentation Site](https://stuchain.github.io/CuePoint/)
- **Security**: [Security Policy](SECURITY.md)

## Thank You

Thank you for being part of the CuePoint community! Your participation makes this project better for everyone.
